name: Creeper World 3 Script File
summary: A CRPL file is a script saved in the Creeper Reverse Polish Language (CRPL). It contains one or more instructions that are executed to modify maps in Creeper World 3: Arc Eternal, a tower defense real-time strategy game. CRPL files may also store comments, which are preceded by #, that are added by the creator to explain the code in the file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Knuckle Cracker Creeper World 3: Arc Eternal

macos.display_name: Knuckle Cracker Creeper World 3: Arc Eternal

linux.display_name: Knuckle Cracker Creeper World 3: Arc Eternal
